
Jesse Trippe
--------

Designed and hand-coded by Jesse Trippe in Seattle, WA.

@jessetrippe

TECHNOLOGY
----------

Tailwind CSS - Utility CSS framework
tailwindcss.com

Jekyll - Static site generator
jekyllrb.com

GitHub - Code collaboration & hosting
github.com


TOOLS
-----

Sublime Text - Text editor
sublimetext.com

Sketch - Graphics editor
sketchapp.com

Illustrator - Graphics editor
adobe.com

FONTS
-----

Windsor
https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/windsor/

Roboto Mono
https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto+Mono
